section_title: Power to provide for temporary absence of receiver.
section_text: 1 If and whilst the receiver for the metropolitan police district is temporarily  unable to act whether by reason of absence or otherwise  a person appointed by warrant under the hand of the Secretary of State may temporarily act as and shall be deemed for all purposes to be such receiver.
2 This Act may be cited as the Metropolitan Police (Receiver) Act 1895, and shall be read with the Metropolitan Police Acts 1829 to 1890.
